TextLibrary.Text: You see a bunch of Dark Dwarves outside Kal-Ungar using a Dragon to help them haul rock and ore.
You have failed to defeat the Dark Dwarves. You must try again.
You should have Flicker in the party to rescue his mother.
You have chased away the Dark Dwarves. Flicker's mother is finally free.
You must travel to Kal-Ungar and rescue Flicker's mother from the Dark Dwarves.
